function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 via droplet, contact, and airborne routes in indoor environments.","Impact":"Potential transmission of COVID-19 leading to illness, hospitalization, and possible death.","Mitigation":"Implementation of social distancing, face coverings, hand hygiene, surface cleaning, and adequate ventilation.","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers, disinfectants, and monitoring devices for air quality.","People":"General public, employees, students, gym-goers, and individuals in shared indoor spaces.","Owner":"Public health authorities, building owners, employers, and facility managers."}]}
